item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

March 20, 2008 - Monthly Meeting

Robyn Thompson- "The QUEEN of REHAB!"

"Buying, Selling and Rehabbing Single Family and Multi Family homes for HUGE PROFITS! - The Nuts & Bolts!! "

Robyn Thompson is the nation's leading expert in buying, renovating and selling single and multifamily homes for huge profits. Robyn has renovated and sold over 200 homes!!!

Here?s Just A Short List Of The Content That What?ll Be Covered:

? Five Unique Profit Centers from Real Estate
? 11 sources of Motivated Sellers
? 13 Marketing Techniques to Find Killer Deals
? Types of Properties NOT to Buy
? Coordinating Contractors for Maximum Profits
? Employees vs. Handy Men vs. Independent Contractors
? Never Write More than Seven Checks to Renovate a Home
? Sources for Finding Quality Contractors
? Getting Money to Grow Your Income to $1,000,000a Year
? Marketing Techniques to Sell Your Property Quickly
? Prescreening the Buyers Who Want Your Home
? Three Types of Mortgages to Cash-out Big Profits



March 22 PM - SATURDAY - ALL DAY TRAINING - 8:00 AM

8:00 AM - Registration

8:30 AM - 4:30 - Meeting

Cost: Members - pre-registration - $49, spouse/partner - $30
Visitor pre-registration - $99, spouse/partner - $40
At the door EVERYONE pays $99
